languages.text: "Нам надо уйти сейчас. Мы еще придем говорить с тобой". {n}Снова следует пауза, такая долгая, что тишина становится пронзительнее крика. Наконец сервиторы нарушают ее:{/n}
"We must go now. We will come to speak with you later." {n}Another pause follows, so long that the silence becomes more piercing than a scream. Then the servitors finally break it.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Нам надо уйти сейчас. Мы еще придем говорить с тобой". {n}Снова следует пауза, такая долгая, что тишина становится пронзительнее крика. Наконец сервиторы нарушают ее:{/n}

traits.locale_text: "We must go now. We will come to speak with you later." {n}Another pause follows, so long that the silence becomes more piercing than a scream. Then the servitors finally break it.{/n}
"We must go now. We will come to speak with you later." {n}Another pause follows, so long that the silence becomes more piercing than a scream. Then the servitors finally break it.{/n}
"We must go now. We will come to speak with you later." {n}Another pause follows, so long that the silence becomes more piercing than a scream. Then the servitors finally break it.{/n}
"We must go now. We will come to speak with you later." {n}Another pause follows, so long that the silence becomes more piercing than a scream. Then the servitors finally break it.{/n}
"We must go now. We will come to speak with you later." {n}Another pause follows, so long that the silence becomes more piercing than a scream. Then the servitors finally break it.{/n}

languages.text: 「我々は行かなくては。また後で話しに来ます」{n}再び沈黙が訪れた。あまりに長い沈黙は叫び声よりも身を刺すように感じる。そしてサーヴィターがついに沈黙を破った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We must go now. We will come to speak with you later." {n}Another pause follows, so long that the silence becomes more piercing than a scream. Then the servitors finally break it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我々は行かなくては。また後で話しに来ます」{n}再び沈黙が訪れた。あまりに長い沈黙は叫び声よりも身を刺すように感じる。そしてサーヴィターがついに沈黙を破った。{/n}

languages.text: “我们得先走了， 我们以后再来找你谈。”{n}随后又是一阵漫长的停顿，以至于寂静似乎比尖叫更刺耳。在这之后，机仆们的声音打破了寂静。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We must go now. We will come to speak with you later." {n}Another pause follows, so long that the silence becomes more piercing than a scream. Then the servitors finally break it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们得先走了， 我们以后再来找你谈。”{n}随后又是一阵漫长的停顿，以至于寂静似乎比尖叫更刺耳。在这之后，奴工们的声音打破了寂静。{/n}

languages.text: "Wir müssen nun gehen. Wir kommen später, um mit Euch zu sprechen." {n}Es folgt eine weitere Pause, so lang, dass das Schweigen durchdringender wird als ein Schrei. Dann brechen die Servitoren es endlich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We must go now. We will come to speak with you later." {n}Another pause follows, so long that the silence becomes more piercing than a scream. Then the servitors finally break it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wir müssen nun gehen. Wir kommen später, um mit Euch zu sprechen." {n}Es folgt eine weitere Pause, so lang, dass das Schweigen durchdringender wird als ein Schrei. Dann brechen die Servitoren es endlich.{/n}

languages.text: « Nous devons partir, à présent. Nous reviendrons vous parler plus tard. » {n}Un autre silence s'ensuit, si long qu'il en devient assourdissant, avant que les servitors ne décident d'y mettre un terme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We must go now. We will come to speak with you later." {n}Another pause follows, so long that the silence becomes more piercing than a scream. Then the servitors finally break it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nous devons partir, à présent. Nous reviendrons vous parler plus tard. » {n}Un autre silence s'ensuit, si long qu'il en devient assourdissant, avant que les servitors ne décident d'y mettre un terme.{/n}

languages.text: «Ahora debemos irnos. Vendremos luego para hablar con usted». {n}Otra pausa, tan prolongada que el silencio se te antoja más ensordecedor que un grito, hasta que los servidores lo rompen por fin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We must go now. We will come to speak with you later." {n}Another pause follows, so long that the silence becomes more piercing than a scream. Then the servitors finally break it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ahora debemos irnos. Vendremos luego para hablar con usted». {n}Otra pausa, tan prolongada que el silencio se te antoja más ensordecedor que un grito, hasta que los servidores lo rompen por fin.{/n}

languages.text: "Gitmemiz gerekiyor. Daha sonra görüşeceğiz." {n}Hemen ardından bir duraksama daha geliyor. Öyle uzun bir duraksama ki sessizlik, çığlıktan daha çok kulak tırmalıyor. Sonrasında hizmetörler, sessizliğe son veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We must go now. We will come to speak with you later." {n}Another pause follows, so long that the silence becomes more piercing than a scream. Then the servitors finally break it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Gitmemiz gerekiyor ancak sonra görüşeceğiz." {n}Hemen ardından bir duraksama daha geliyor. Öyle uzun bir duraksama ki sessizlik, bir çığlıktan daha çok kulak tırmalıyor. Hizmetörler sessizliğe son veriyor.{/n}
